Do they refund you the taxes if waitlist didnâ€™t go through?

From what I read online:â€˜You're issued a ticket for the waitlist  points deducted  taxes paid.If you cancel / refund before the flight (whether or not waitlist is confirmed)  you need to pay $50 refund fee for the points and taxes refund.If you don't cancel (even if you are NOT confirmed a seat by departure)  you can use the ticket for up to a year from booking  but it has to be the same departure/destination.â€™My advice is do not put yourself on the waitlist.
